problem.markdown:
>>Which of the following is a renewable, but potentially depletable, energy source? << () wind () solar (x) biomass () hydroelectric () coal
[explanation] Biomass (such as wood or corn) is a renewable resource, but could be depleted if the harvest exceeds new growth. [explanation]
problem.p: Which of the following is a renewable, but potentially depletable, energy source?

choicegroup.label: Which of the following is a renewable, but potentially depletable, energy source?

div.p: Biomass (such as wood or corn) is a renewable resource, but could be depleted if the harvest exceeds new growth.
